battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Computer, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends Object
    This class is an abstraction of the game's players. The class contains the player's game table, ships, points and all the other relevant data about the player during the game.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      A constructor to create a new instance of the class without a BattleShipGame object defined.
      Player(BattleShipGame game)
      A constructor to create a new instance of the class with its BattleShipGame object defined.

      • chooseASquare

        public abstract Square chooseASquare(Table table,
                   boolean aSquareCanBeHitMultipleTimes)
        Choose a square to bomb from a table.
        Parameters:
        table - the Table to choose the square from
        aSquareCanBeHitMultipleTimes - defines if a square can be bombed multiple times
        Returns:
        the Square to be bombed

      • shipsArePlaced

        public boolean shipsArePlaced()
        Returns the state of the Ships' placement on the player's Table.
        Returns:
        true if all ships are placed on the table, false otherwise

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints(int points)
        Adds points to the player according to the amount given as a parameter.

        The amount of points granted from different kinds of hits are defined in the Points enum type.

        Parameters:
        points - the amount of points to be added

      • addShotsMissed

        public void addShotsMissed(int shotsMissed)
        Adds the amount of shots missed during the player's turn.
        Parameters:
        shotsMissed - the amount of missed shots to be added

      • addShotsHit

        public void addShotsHit(int shotsHit)
        Adds the amount of shots that hit a ShipPart during the player's turn.
        Parameters:
        shotsHit - the amount shots that hit a ship part to be added

      • allShipsDestroyed

        public boolean allShipsDestroyed()
        Returns the state of the Ships.
        Returns:
        true if all ships are destroyed, false otherwise

      • getAccuracy

        public Double getAccuracy()
        Returns the player's shot accuracy.
        Returns:
        the percentage of shots that have hit a ship part
